channel.title: BrokenITGuy Updates
channel.description: Live log entries from the headless pipeline.

item.title: Update: No Date
item.description:
Taking a break from automation and website development to focus on the homelab.
Currently working on getting the media server operational.

item.title: Update: No Date
item.description:
Phase 1 of the automation is complete. I managed to brute-force the final scripts into submission last night before the inevitable hardware failure.
My brain successfully executed the logic gates required, but my physical chassis decided it had reached critical temperature. The titanium in my spine started throwing severe interrupt requests, forcing a non-graceful shutdown.
I crashed. Hard. I wasn't just tired; I was operating on negative sleep debt and pure spite. I hate that 'hustle culture' energy, but sometimes, getting the win means working until your body throws up its own blue screen. Time for a painful, but productive, morning reboot.
